title: The District Conservator of Forest (DCF), Satara Division shall inspect all sites having dense tree cover and Steep Slopes prior to the sanction for the development permission in order to ascertain and verify the information provided about tree cover shown in the plans
clause_text: The District Conservator of Forest (DCF), Satara Division shall inspect all sites having dense tree cover and Steep Slopes prior to the sanction for the development permission in order to ascertain and verify the information provided about tree cover shown in the plans. On such inspection, the DCF, Satara shall certify whether the area under proposal has dense forest / tree cover or not and if yes he is required to mention the area covered by such dense forest / tree cover / forest alike area.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
